Right now: The PM is holding a press conference in Canberra. Watch it live here - http://t.co/1QuPsRTP TeamJG

Education is at the heart of Labor's plan for Australia. We want to improve learning and results for every child #Gonski JG

I am attending a national security strategy workshop in cooperation with the UN and EU.
I arrive in Bonneuil-sur-Marne to meet the inhabitants of the Flemming district which will be rehabilitated in 2013. http://t.co/mhh7OfCQ
What people in working-class neighborhoods are asking for is strong public policies towards employment and housing. # FH2012
Discussion in a stairwell. A resident explains to me the urgency of the rehabilitation of this district. # FH2012 http://t.co/FMXNh0yB
Meeting with Flemming's shopkeepers: the baker asks me for "a return to life" in his neighborhood. # FH2012 http://t.co/C3xjyHk9
I am moderating a session on security challenges in Libya. I am now conducting a panel discussion on the security challenges in Libya.
The chief of staff told me that the Libyan army is now in Kufra and security is now stable. The government set up an emergency committee last night to deal with the situation.
I will meet with the Chief of Staff shortly after the situation in Kufra and I will make a statement. I ll be meeting with the Army Chief later and I ll twit then.
Dialogue with actors from the associative world of the district, at the MJC of Bonneuil-sur-Marne. # FH2012 http://t.co/eIOP4PwM
Bonneuil, the neighborhoods, are a chance for the Republic. It is here that there is the youngest and most diverse population. # FH2012

This morning we headed the act of entry into force of the "Dicom Law", a great benefit for 4 million Chileans: http://t.co/iKKwTDXc
The data of debts under 2.5 million will be erased, for once, from Dicom and so many may start the month of March with the right foot.
The commercial data of millions of Chileans can not be used for purposes of hindering their access to work, education or health
I congratulate the deputies who are the authors of this law and the parliamentarians who approved it because it is a second opportunity for many Chileans.
Today the PM joined students at Our Lady of the Rosary Primary School during their maths lesson. Take a look. TeamJG http://t.co/uDaYjt0N
RT @PGarrettMP: I'm hosting the first public forum on the Gonski review tomorrow in Canberra, you send in questions using this hashtag # ...
I was now on the phone with Mr. Chief of Staff and confirmed that the situation in Kufra was quiet from yesterday afternoon. He confirmed the presence of troops from outside the Kufra.
I just got off the phone with the Army Chief and he confirmed that the situation in Kufra is very quite since yesterday afternoon.
"Twitter: we will not let ourselves be intimidated!" by @vincentfeltesse http://t.co/Wx0AVaHu via @LeHuffPost # FH2012

May God grant you so much solidarity, so much Love, my beloved and beloved Compatriots! I will live! We will live! Overcome! Ever onward to victory!
@ robertf08142998 Amen my dear friend and compatriot. God bless you!
@JimmyJQB That JimmyJQB! Nobody will win us! United and Conscious, We will win! Pa'lantePuebloMío!
Today we begin a tour of Valparaíso, O'Higgins, Maule and BíoBío to verify on the ground the progress of the reconstruction
We started in Lo Abarca, visiting Mrs. Amelia Velásquez, a damaged microentrepreneur who went ahead with the help of CORFO
And in Santa Cruz we celebrate, together with the workers and beneficiary families, the tijerales of 544 homes: http://t.co/8YzDVrNA
Then we inaugurated a cultural center, visited school in Peralillo and the rescue museum of the 33 miners in Santa Cruz cc @ceciliamorel
@Max_Martin_R thanks
#LauraChinchilla President of Costa Rica expressed her willingness to support my proposal to discuss the decriminalization of drugs.

I came this morning to meet the collective #ACLEFEU who installed a "Ministry of the crisis of the suburbs" in the heart of Paris. # FH2012
Government and #WorldBank sign loan agreement aimed at advancing high #education and #science in #Montenegro http://t.co/gI1rTRVs @WorldBank
I come to have time for a dialogue and after the time of an action that I hope will largely mobilize neighborhoods. # FH2012
PM Lukšić launches consultations on constitutional amendments with opposition http://t.co/DSiDVqcF #Montenegro
No territory should be left behind, no citizen should be abandoned. Since alas 5 years, it is the feeling that has settled.
So many promises have been made to these neighborhoods, so many Marshall plans have been announced without any reality. # FH2012
Here's a link to the statement the PM released this evening - http://t.co/SLwj7S9N TeamJG
Meeting with the leaders of the Genopole, in Evry, for an afternoon on the theme of research. # FH2012 http://t.co/N7wNY7zP
The Genopole is a site that has the particularity of bringing together a hospital, 70 companies, and 20 laboratories: a "valley of genetics".
In this center every day researchers advance knowledge with patience and stubbornness #Genopole # FH2012 http://t.co/GkT1bpkD
I will ask Parliament to amend the law to authorize embryonic stem cell research # FH2012
By modifying the bioethical law of 2011 we will catch up and encourage the return of post-docs. # FH2012
This modification of the bioethical law will of course be done with respect for human dignity and the non-commercialization of life.
I trust science, which means giving financial, material and legislative means to continue research. # FH2012
Congratulations @tommy photo for # year image! A humble thank you to the Press Photographers Club because I was #njoyed.
@pkfoto Thanks!
RT @restosducoeur Your mission if you accept it: propel the hashtag # restos2012 in trending topic! We count on you ;)
At this time the religious office presided by the Archbishop ended, on the occasion of the Lent that begins with Ash Wednesday.
I meet with @manuelvalls young Evryens and Evryennes engaged in a café in the city. # FH2012 http://t.co/dP6zvGNR
For several months, I put youth in the heart of my campaign, because the success of young people will help France to recover! # FH2012
@knwanze. I confirm-was a great day! Thank you for job well done # ifad ..!
@alexmzei. How are u in Lyantonde? Thanks!
We will have the goal that 100,000 young people do their civic service in 2017! # FH2012
A young woman asks me the question of equal pay between men and women. We will give businesses one year to comply with the law.
@GYIN1. Hello,is it possible to meet up in Kigali at some point? Would love to meet you! Thanks

I arrive at Agora d'Evry for a public meeting with @manuelvalls. The Evryens have come! # FH2012
I am a candidate in the presidential election to bring a message of equality! # FH2012
@chavistadecoraz All my love for you. I promise you that I will fight without respite for life. I will live ... We will live! And we will win!
We need to be together if we want to succeed! # FH2012
@ ruma22 God with us. Who against us? Hugs RUMA! Viva Yaracuy!
I want to change the way we look at neighborhoods. # FH2012
I do not want to install fear, I want, on the contrary, to bring out hope. # FH2012
@ Mila_Silva04 Mila: it's more than love, Frenzy! An eternal Love!
We have the duty that it is in the popular districts that the new means of the National Education are affected. # FH2012
No one between the ages of 16 and 18 can claim to be forgotten by the society in which he lives. # FH2012
All empty land belonging to the state will be made available to social landlords and communities. #Housing # FH2012
We have seen the progression of violence to people over the last 10 years. I can not accept it. # FH2012
We will create a local police force present and in confidence with the population and will define priority security zones. # FH2012
Is it acceptable that people can not get into employment because of their address or their skin color? # FH2012
Is it acceptable that it is always the same young people who are controlled, suspect? # FH2012
It is not religions that will impose their rules in the public space! # FH2012
I will restore the Ministry of Women's Rights to ensure equality! # FH2012
What would France be without her people who set out to take charge of their future? # FH2012
Our duty will be to lead each jobseeker to a solution. It will go through the renovation of employment center. # FH2012
The only referendum is whether the French want change or if they want to keep the outgoing president. # FH2012
The referendum is May 6! You will decide which President you want for France. # FH2012
Do you want to engage a new page of our History? # FH2012
The only fear I know is the one that would make us take the past for our future. # FH2012
I need you in this campaign, because in the end, everything will start in the next days! # FH2012
It is not the crisis that explains the failure, it is the failure that has also led to the crisis. # FH2012
Be proud of the Republic, be proud of the future of the reconciled Republic! # FH2012
